timeline.message: Bug fix: #1176 - When the resource level production endpoints are provided for all the resources without an API level production endpoint, microgateway project build fails
add integration tests for resource endpoints alone scenario

timeline.bodyText: Better to mention which operation this is. Otherwise user have to go through all operations to find which operation is causing the issue.
timeline.author: praminda

replies.bodyText:
This was implemented in such a way that the exception thrown in here is caught from the method above. Otherwise, we need to pass the operation name, path information to this layer. This is a sample error message.
micro-gw: Error while parsing information under path:/products/{productId}in the API "Online-Store-Api:v1.0.0".
        -Error while parsing the information under GET resource.
        -The endpoint Configuration is not provided for the operation.
